heading: last deadline
subheading: chris nolan, former technology columnist for the san jose mercury news, resigned from the silicon valley newspaper monday. nolan had the column taken away from her in july after the paper discovered she had profited in a stock deal as a result of her reporting contacts, a violation of the mercury's ethics policy.
author: wired staff
text: chris nolan, former technology columnist for the  san jose mercury news, resigned from the silicon valley newspaper monday. nolan had the column taken away from her in july after the paper discovered she had profited in a stock deal as a result of her reporting contacts, a violation of the mercury's ethics policy.
